text: Atrivimɨn akam baraghizir Livaibar ziabar kara: Amasain otarim Mahat ko, Asarian otarim Joel, aning Kohatɨn ikɨzimɨn gumazimning. Ezɨ Apdin otarim Kis, ko, Jehalelelɨn otarim Asaria, aning Merarin ikɨzimɨn gumazimning. Ezɨ Siman otarim Joa ko, Joan otarim Iden, aning Gersonɨn ikɨzimɨn gumazimning.
